price: ហើយក្នុងអំឡុងពេលយប់ ចូរអ្នកស៊ូជូត(ថ្វាយបង្គំ) ចំពោះទ្រង់ និងលើកតម្កើងទ្រង់នៅពេលយប់ជ្រៅ។
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbiḥ'hu laylan ṭawīlan
